issue.title: switch to regular email system
issue.body: [lettre](https://lettre.at) seems quite good. let's replace our current http-driven-email-system with a regular email sending using that.

issue.title: Let's deploy this - call for consortium

labels.name: deployment
labels.description: deploying it - infrastructure, ci, docker etc

issue.body: Who is interested in running a consortium of communities running this chain? Please post here, would be great if you could also give a one-liner, what your community is about.

issue.title: single entrypoint docker-compose
issue.body:
- [ ] a slim `Dockerfile` to put the entire build (binary & JS build) into
- [ ] a `docker-compose.yml`, that uses the docker-image and provides a single http-endpoint (potentially with an nginx in front) to
  1. [ ] host and serve the static-html
  2. [ ] allow access to the JSON-RPC 
  3. [ ] pass-through to the websocket
